bibl.title: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, February 19, 1948

div1.p: Nogueira is looking forward to Hench's arrival in Cuba. Hench will meet with the President of Cuba during his visit.

div1.head: Letter from Pedro Nogueira to Philip Showalter Hench, February 19, 1948
div1.opener:
DR. PEDRO NOGUEIRA
MEDICO CIRUJANO
MARTI 219. MARIANAO
Marianao Febrero 19 de 1948
TELEFONOS: FO-7577
FO-7392
Dr Philip Hench
Villa Atlantique
Palm Beach, Florida
U.S.A.
Dear Dr Hench:
div1.p:
Your kind letter was received, announcing
your visit to Havana, and I shall be pleased to meet you
at the airport upon your arrival.

Also, the President of the Republic knows of your de-
sire to interview him, and arrangement are being made for
him to receive you on March 2nd.

I shall be pleased to be of assistance to you in any
other matter that you may desire.
div1.closer: Very sincerely Dr Pedro Nogueira PN/vt.
